sentence.text: Also the well-known gene variants rs7903146 in negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II, and rs17817449 in DNA dealkylation involved in DNA repair, were nominally associated with hyperglycemia (rs7903146), as well as with higher fasting insulin levels (rs17817449).

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
DNA dealkylation involved in DNA repair
